> By who/how will judging be done?

The group, through a series of polls, asking to rank the scenarios in 
order of worst to best in a few categories.  The best gets the highest 
points in each category and every category gets the same amount of 
points.  Add up the scores from all the categories and whoever has the 
most points wins. [Admittedly, I've been working on the ideas for 
which categories, but hadn't got that far along] (if anybody has other 
ideas for the categories, I'm all ears)

1)most fun/enjoyable

2)ease of mobility

3)best overall
